fields.label: Highlights
fields.name: landing_highlights
fields.instructions: Define highlighted bullet points, with optional icons, that are displayed under the landing page header area.

sub_fields.label: Font Icon Classes
sub_fields.name: landing_highlight_icon_font_classes
sub_fields.instructions: Add classes, separated by a single space, for a supported font icon (e.g. Font Awesome) to display.

sub_fields.label: Font Icon Color
sub_fields.name: landing_highlight_icon_font_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select the color for the font icon.

title: Clone Group - Page Header Image and Video Fields

fields.label: Header Image (-sm+)
fields.name: page_header_image
fields.instructions: Header image to display at the -sm breakpoint and up.

fields.label: Header Image (-xs)
fields.name: page_header_image_xs
fields.instructions: Header image to display at the -xs breakpoint.

fields.label: Header Video (MP4)
fields.name: page_header_mp4
fields.instructions: If a MP4 video is defined, video will be used instead of an image in the header at the -sm breakpoint and higher.  Note that videos will never be displayed at the -xs breakpoint, so a fallback header image should always be provided when using video.

fields.label: Header Video (WebM)
fields.name: page_header_webm
fields.instructions: Supplemental video format used by supported browsers for optimized performance.  Note that a MP4 must at least be provided for video to be displayed in the header.

fields.label: Header Video Loop
fields.name: page_header_video_loop
fields.instructions: If checked, and a header video is available, the header video will loop indefinitely.

fields.label: Content Before Form
fields.name: landing_header_content_custom
fields.instructions: Content displayed immediately before the header form (or its call-to-action button). You should include a h1 somewhere at the beginning of this content.

fields.label: How should the form be displayed?
fields.name: landing_header_form_type

choices.togglemodal: Toggle button + display form in modal

fields.label: Toggle Button Text
fields.name: landing_form_cta_text
fields.instructions: Text used in the call-to-action button that toggles the header form visibility.  Accepts shortcodes (e.g. for insertion of icons).

fields.label: What content should be displayed in the modal?
fields.name: landing_header_modal_content_type

fields.label: Modal Custom Content - Before Form
fields.name: landing_header_modal_content_custom
fields.instructions: Custom content to display immediately above the form in the modal, in lieu of the form's title + description.

fields.label: Form Instruction Text
fields.name: landing_header_form_instructions
fields.instructions: Custom content to display above the form, after the user has clicked the toggle button and enabled the form.
fields.default_value: Thanks for your interest! Please add more information so we can better assist you.

sub_fields.label: Subheader Image Position (-lg+)
sub_fields.name: position
sub_fields.instructions: Position of the subheader image at the -lg breakpoint and up.  (This image will always be centered and stacked horizontally under the -lg breakpoint.)

fields.label: Title Text
fields.name: landing_nav_title
fields.instructions: Text to display within the simplified navbar at the top of this landing page.  Is not displayed at the -sm breakpoint and down.

fields.label: Header Text Color
fields.name: page_header_text_color
fields.instructions: Modify the color of the text within the page header. Please keep in mind accessible color contrast requirements when selecting a color to use. If no header image/video are provided, the header text will always be black, regardless of this option's value.

fields.label: Header Content - Type of Content
fields.name: page_header_content_type
fields.instructions: Specify the type of content that should be displayed within the header.  Choose "Default" to display a styled page title and optional form, or choose "Custom content" to add any arbitrary content.  If "Custom content" is selected, a page title (h1) and form are NOT included by default and must be added manually.

fields.label: Header Title Text
fields.name: page_header_title
fields.instructions: (Optional) Title text to display in the header.  The page title will be used if left blank.

fields.label: Header Form
fields.name: page_header_form_option
fields.instructions: Select what form, if any, should be displayed in the header.

choices.default: Default Header Form (set in Theme Customizer)

fields.label: Custom Header Form
fields.name: page_header_form_custom
fields.instructions: Select a custom form to display in the header.

fields.label: Header Height (sm+)
fields.name: page_header_height
fields.instructions: Minimum height of the page header at the -sm breakpoint and above.

fields.label: Exclude Primary Site Navigation
fields.name: page_header_exclude_nav
fields.instructions: Controls whether or not the primary site navigation should be displayed at the top of the page.

fields.label: Include Subnavigation
fields.name: page_header_include_subnav
fields.instructions: Enable this setting to display an affixed subnavigation bar below the page header.  Requires the Automatic Sections Menu plugin to be activated, and for at least one section within the page's content to be configured to appear in the navbar.

fields.label: Subfooter Section
fields.name: page_subfooter_section_option
fields.instructions: Whether or not to display the Subfooter Section right above the footer on this page. Defaults to true.

fields.label: Title Prefix
fields.name: person_title_prefix
fields.instructions: A prefix to be applied to this person's name when displayed formally, e.g. "Mr.", "Mrs.", "Dr.".

fields.label: Title Suffix
fields.name: person_title_suffix
fields.instructions:
A suffix to be applied to this person's name when displayed formally, e.g. "Jr.", "III".
Include a preceding comma and space when denoting a person's earned academic degree, e.g. ", Ph.D."

fields.label: Academic/Professional Title
fields.name: person_jobtitle
fields.instructions: A title that describes this person, academic or professional; e.g. "Student" or "Professor of Economics"

fields.label: Order By Name
fields.name: person_orderby_name
fields.instructions: Name by which this person should be sorted when people are displayed in alphabetical lists.

fields.label: Related Degree(s)
fields.name: person_degrees
fields.instructions: For students, list one or more degrees that this person is earning/has earned.  For faculty/staff, list any degrees that this person provides courses or advising for.

fields.label: Phone Numbers
fields.name: person_phone_numbers
fields.instructions: One or more phone numbers at which the person can be contacted.

fields.label: Office Map URL
fields.name: person_room_url
fields.instructions: URL that displays the Office Location on a map; e.g. http://map.ucf.edu/?show=45

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: section_background_color
fields.instructions: Select the background color of the section.

fields.label: Text Color
fields.name: section_text_color
fields.instructions:
Override the default text color within the section.

Note that if you picked a predefined color in the Background Color field, an accessible text color will already be applied.

fields.label: Background Image (-sm+)
fields.name: section_background_image
fields.instructions: The background image to display behind the section at the -sm breakpoint and up (576px+ wide).

fields.label: Background Image (-xs)
fields.name: section_background_image_xs
fields.instructions: The background image to display behind the section at the -xs breakpoint (<=575px wide).  This image is only displayed when a -sm background image has also been selected.

fields.label: Vertical Submenu
fields.name: vertical_submenu
fields.instructions: Menu to use for subnavigation on this page and other pages/posts associated with this vertical.

fields.label: Vertical Submenu Brand
fields.name: vertical_submenu_brand
fields.instructions: Text to use as the "brand" (title) of the submenu.  Will always link back to this vertical.  If a value isn't provided, the vertical's post title will be used.

fields.label: Related Vertical
fields.name: post_vertical
fields.instructions: A vertical (page with the "Vertical" template) to associate this post with.

fields.label: College Filter
fields.name: vertical_college_filter
fields.instructions: Choose the college to use for filtering degree search and popular program results. Leave blank if this is not a college vertical page.

fields.label: Program Type Filter
fields.name: vertical_program_type_filter
fields.instructions: Choose the program type to use for filtering degree search and popular program results. Leave blank if this is not a program type vertical page.

fields.label: Interest Filter
fields.name: vertical_interest_filter
fields.instructions: Choose the interest to use for filtering degree search and popular program results. Leave blank if this is not a interest vertical page.

fields.label: Tag Filter
fields.name: vertical_degrees_tag
fields.instructions: Choose the post tag to use for filtering degree search and popular program results. Leave blank if this is not a tag-based vertical page.

fields.label: Degree Search Placeholder Text
fields.name: degree_search_placeholder
fields.instructions: The placeholder text to use in the degree search.

fields.label: Popular Programs Text
fields.name: popular_programs_text
fields.instructions: The text that will be used for the "Popular Programs" heading.

fields.label: Popular Program Configuration
fields.name: popular_programs_config
fields.instructions: Choose how you would like to filter the popular programs displayed on this page.

choices.tag_override: Display programs with a specific tag.

fields.label: Popular Programs Tag Override
fields.name: popular_programs_tag_override
fields.instructions: Choose the tag to use to display programs.

fields.label: Select Popular Programs
fields.name: popular_programs_programs
fields.instructions: Select the programs to be displayed.

fields.label: Degree Plan Code
fields.name: degree_code
fields.instructions: The plan code of the degree.

fields.label: Degree SubPlan Code
fields.name: degree_subplan_code
fields.instructions: The subplan code of the degree.

fields.label: Degree Duration
fields.name: degree_duration
fields.instructions: This information will be displayed in the same block as the 'Credit Hours' information.

sub_fields.label: Font Icon Classes
sub_fields.name: degree_duration_font_icon_classes
sub_fields.instructions: The font icon to display above either the credit hours or duration amount. Defaults to: 'fa fa-3x fa-desktop'. Add classes, separated by a single space, for a supported font icon (e.g. Font Awesome) to display.

sub_fields.label: Amount
sub_fields.name: degree_duration_amount
sub_fields.instructions:
The numerical amount to display for this degree's duration. Must be a number.

If this value is entered, the amount, descriptor and notice will be displayed in place of the 'Credit Hours' information, and move the 'Credit Hours' line to a single line at the bottom of the card.

sub_fields.label: Amount Descriptor
sub_fields.name: degree_duration_descriptor
sub_fields.instructions: The amount descriptor for the degree duration. Defaults to 'Months'.

sub_fields.label: Notice
sub_fields.name: degree_duration_notice
sub_fields.instructions: The notice that is showed below the amount descriptor. Defaults to 'Approx. program length'.

fields.label: Tuition Override
fields.name: degree_tuition_code
fields.instructions: When retrieving tuition information, use this specific code to retrieve the fee schedule.

fields.label: Brochure Document
fields.name: degree_brochure_document
fields.instructions: Enter a URL to the degree brochure document

fields.label: Degree Video
fields.name: degree_header_video
fields.instructions: URL to a video that describes this degree.

fields.label: Degree Video Caption
fields.name: degree_video_caption
fields.instructions: Enter a caption that describes the chosen degree video.

fields.label: Degree Spotlight
fields.name: degree_spotlight
fields.instructions: Enter spotlight content that will be displayed under the video for this degree.

fields.label: Badges and Awards
fields.name: degree_awards
fields.instructions: Upload one or more unique badges or awards pertaining to this program.

sub_fields.label: Award Details
sub_fields.name: degree_award_details
sub_fields.instructions:
A brief description of this award.  Will be used as alt text for the award graphic.  The image's caption, description, or alt text from the Media Library will be used as a fallback if no description is provided (prioritized in that order).

If the graphic contains text, this description should contain that text for accessibility.

fields.label: Quotes
fields.name: degree_quotes
fields.instructions: Add one or more quotes about this degree or related subject matter.

sub_fields.label: Quote
sub_fields.name: degree_quote
sub_fields.instructions: The blockquote content. Do not include surrounding quotation marks.

sub_fields.label: Source - title
sub_fields.name: degree_quote_source_title
sub_fields.instructions: Who said the quote? (e.g. a person's name or publication title)

sub_fields.label: Source - subtitle
sub_fields.name: degree_quote_source_subtitle
sub_fields.instructions: Specify a subtitle for the source of this quote (e.g. a student's major + graduating year.)

sub_fields.label: Is this quote sourced from an existing publication?
sub_fields.name: degree_quote_source_has_cite
sub_fields.instructions: If this quote originates from an existing publication, magazine, etc, check this box.  Leave unchecked if it is a direct quote from a student, faculty member, etc.

fields.label: Contact Email
fields.name: degree_contact_email
fields.instructions: (Optional) The email address that header form submission confirmations should be sent to. Leave blank to send to the form's default email address.

fields.label: What type of content should be displayed before the header form?
fields.name: landing_header_content_type
